results.content:
Examples haven't kept up with TypeScript evolution or linting settings. There are a number of places where the examples don't work anymore and someone not familiar with development in general would struggle to move forward.

Also, this isn't really going through the structure of the frameworks, it's really just a step by step guide to creating an app.
results.content_html:

Also, this isn't really going through the structure of the frameworks, it's really just a step by step guide to creating an app.

results.content: Well done! Simple step by step.

I like that the instructor go straight to the point, if you're a total newbie in angular I wouldn't recommend this course, if you're kinda familiar with angular and nest, this is a nice course. However I think it would've been nice if the instructor would've included user authentication since almost all applications nowadays need it, also guards in nest are super important to protect routes and they're not mentioned, besides that, this is a nice start to setup the basis of your next project.
results.content_html: I like that the instructor go straight to the point, if you're a total newbie in angular I wouldn't recommend this course, if you're kinda familiar with angular and nest, this is a nice course. However I think it would've been nice if the instructor would've included user authentication since almost all applications nowadays need it, also guards in nest are super important to protect routes and they're not mentioned, besides that, this is a nice start to setup the basis of your next project.
